results.title: The HMG-CoA inhibitor, simvastatin, triggers in vitro anti-tumour effect and decreases IgM secretion in Waldenstrom macroglobulinaemia.
results.text_hl: The HMG-CoA inhibitor, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, triggers in vitro anti-@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumour@@@ effect and decreases IgM secretion in @<m>DISEASE_Waldenstrom_Macroglobulinemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008258 @@@Waldenstrom macroglobulinaemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Moreau AS, Jia X, Patterson CJ, Roccaro AM, Xu L, Sacco A, O'Connor K, Soumerai J, Ngo HT, Hatjiharissi E, Hunter ZR, Ciccarelli B, Manning R, Ghobrial IM, Leleu X, Treon SP. The HMG-CoA inhibitor, simvastatin, triggers in vitro anti-tumour effect and decreases IgM secretion in Waldenstrom macroglobulinaemia. Br J Haematol. 2008 Sep;142(5):775-85. PMID: 18537966
